function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Frequent visitation of UGS during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to high foot traffic in UGS","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, promote social distancing, and enforce mask-wearing","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring technology, public announcements, and digital signage","People":"Visitors to UGS","Owner":"Local authorities and park management"},{"Description":"Changes in UGS visitation patterns during the pandemic","Impact":"Potential spread of disease due to increased movement between different UGS locations","Mitigation":"Encourage consistent visitation to one UGS, promote stay-at-home orders, and limit non-essential travel","Technologies":"GPS tracking, geofencing, and communication campaigns","People":"Visitors to UGS","Owner":"Local health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Perceptions of UGS during home quarantine","Impact":"Psychological impact of limited access to green spaces on mental well-being","Mitigation":"Promote indoor greenery, provide virtual nature experiences, and support mental health resources","Technologies":"Virtual reality, indoor plants, and mental health apps","People":"Residential communities in quarantine","Owner":"Health and wellness organizations"}]}
